from bottom to where to donate beginning of bodice secure yarn variations of izzy dolls sometimes called comfort dolls are welcomed by many embroider eyes pull remaining black volunteer organizations both locally and yarn from long tail cast on through body overseas and embroider eyes secure yarn i support health partners international canada with my dolls hpic uses the dolls instead of packaging material to define arms using ends from neck protect medicines and medical supplies seam on define arms with tiny that are distributed to relief clinics in backstitches through all layers -
